title: Wiki-Based Group Collaboration and Assessment Capability Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic proficiency in digital tools and specialized knowledge in language education
context.additional_context: A language education program for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields, emphasizing collaborative learning via Web 2.0 tools in a digitally supported environment.

learning_goals: Learners can design and implement two-week group projects using wiki platforms
Learners can develop peer and self-assessment criteria and perform wiki-based formative assessments with over 80% accuracy
Learners can submit case studies demonstrating at least three improvements to group collaboration processes using action research methodology
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
